#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#define ll long long
#define pb push_back
using namespace std ;

int z[1000002];
void Z_algo(string s)
{
  int n=s.length();
  int L = 0, R = 0;
  z[0]=n;
  for (int i = 1; i < n; i++)
   {
    if (i > R)
    {
    L = R = i;
    while (R < n && s[R-L] == s[R]) R++;
    z[i] = R-L; R--;
    }
    else
    {
    int k = i-L;
    if (z[k] < R-i+1) z[i] = z[k];
    else
    {
      L = i;
      while (R < n && s[R-L] == s[R]) R++;
      z[i] = R-L; R--;
    }
    }
   }
}
 
 
 int main(){
 
    string s1;
    int t,i;
    
      cin>>s1;
      Z_algo(s1);
      int maxm = 0;
      for(i=1;i<s1.length();++i)
         maxm = max(maxm,z[i]);
         
        if(maxm==0)
          cout<<"NO\n";
        else{
        	int fir ;
        	int occ  = 0;;
        	for(i=1;i<s1.length();++i)
        	   if(z[i]==maxm)
        	     {
        	     	occ++;
        	     	if(occ==1)
        	     		fir = i;
        	     }
        	 if(occ==1)
        	    cout<<"NO\n";
        	 else{
        	 	cout<<"YES\n";
        	 	  cout<<fir<<endl;
        	 }
        }
    
   
    
    return 0;
}
